Question: In the 2021 movie 'The White Tiger', which character is portrayed by Adarsh Gourav?
Options:
A. Balram Halwai
B. Ashok Sharma
C. Both Balram Halwai and Ashok Sharma
D. None of the above
Answer: Both Balram Halwai and Ashok Sharma
